named-query.name: getSetPartsBySetId
named-query.query: select sp from SetPartEntity sp join sp.partColor pc join pc.part p join p.category ca join pc.color c where sp.set.id = :setId order by sp.id desc

named-query.name: getSetPartBySetAndPrtColorId
named-query.query: select sp from SetPartEntity sp where sp.set.id = :setId and sp.partColor.id = :partColorId
